reviews/0/review: This outlet is located inside a chowpatty. The food is quite average. The mochar chop unfortunately had no flavour of mocha in it. It tasted good enough to be called a vegetable chop instead. The paneer kosha was quite tasty though. We ended up ordering extra roti to finish up the yummy gravy. The Aloo posto combo was quite average. The quantity of the posto and sabzis could have been more though.

We went last weekend for dinner buffet to Citrus cafe of Lemon tree Hinjawadi. The buffet options were limited especially the starters selection was very poor. Chinese was not up to the mark as there was some smell in the noodles. All other items were very average in taste. Some items didn't seem fresh. We didn't enjoy the taste at all. After coming home midnight I had vomiting due to indigestion and my husband and kid also had digestion issues and stomach pain. It was indeed a very pathetic exp...not expected from a brand like Lemon tree to serve stale and tasteless food.
reviews/1/review:
We went with office group of 4. They didnt acknowledge that zomato booking was done. Ala carte was not available so went for lunch buffet. Food was below average for this price range. Chicken curry pieces were over and we had to ask twice to replenish. Variety was limited too. Desert was some basic kheer and banana custard.
Service was overwhelmed with a big group which had arrived separately. Basic things like availability of quarter plates were not there.

You can skip there shakes, as they are of average taste only. But, all of their frappes are worth trying.

Absolutely amazing experience!
The owner, Chirag, was incredibly warm and hospitable. He personally took the time to walk us through the menu and insisted we try the different flavours available. Highly recommend this place ‚Äì not just for the ice creams, but for the heart behind it!
